about_the_game:
Welcome to Wood Shop Simulator!

Chop down trees, master woodworking, and craft beautiful creations to sell at auction. Whether you're legally harvesting in the woods or risking it all in the city, your craftsmanship and reputation will determine your success. Upgrade your tools, hire skilled workers, and expand your workshop as you build a name for yourself in the world of fine woodworking.

Master Woodworking Skills

Start by chopping down trees and carrying the logs to your storage. Use blueprints from vendors to carve your logs with precision, maximizing accuracy for higher-quality pieces. Each crafted item is a testament to your skill.

Upgrade Your Tools and Blueprints

Invest in better saws, chisels, and other equipment to enhance your efficiency. As you level up, unlock new blueprints and tools that allow for even more intricate and valuable creations.

Expand Your Workshop

As your fame grows, so does your business. Expand your workshop, add new workstations, and hire workers to help with tasks like chopping, carving, painting, and decorating.

Illegal Chopping and Police Pursuits

Feeling daring? Chop down trees in the city, but be prepared to face the consequences! The police will hunt you down, adding an extra thrill to your woodworking journey.

Sell at Auction

Carry your crafted pieces to the auction house, where you can sell them to the highest bidder. Increase your fame to make your pieces more valuable, both at auction and in the eyes of society.




Are you ready to carve out your success and leave your mark on the world of woodworking?
